casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Aron HARPER. No. 337P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 28, 2016. Christopher W. Brooks, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Leslie S. Robinson, Greenville, for Harper, Aron. Kimberly S. Robb, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 6th of October 2015 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of January 2016."

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 6th of October 2015 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of January 2016."
